com.vmware.avi.sdk

Class AviApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.avi.sdk.AviApi

  • public class AviApi
extends Object
    This class creates a session with controller and facilitates CRUD operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        public static AviApi getSession(AviCredentials aviCredentials)
                         throws IOException
        This static factory method to create session if not present in the pool if presents in the session pool returns existing session.
        Parameters:
        aviCredentials - Containing the credentials of the controller.
        Returns:
        A session representing the session for the controller.
        Throws:
        IOException - if get any exception to set session.

      • get

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject get(String path,
                                      Map<String,String> params)
                               throws AviApiException
        This method calls the GET REST API.
        Parameters:
        path - A String containing the objectType to be get from controller.
        params - A Map which can contain URL params if any.
        Returns:
        A JSONObeject representing response of the GET REST call.
        Throws:
        AviApiException - if there any error in executing GET request.

      • put

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject put(String path,
                                      org.json.simple.JSONObject body)
                               throws AviApiException
        This method calls the PUT REST API.
        Parameters:
        path - A String containing object type which want to PUT on the controller.
        body - A JSONObject containing object details.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject representing response of the PUT REST call.
        Throws:
        AviApiException - if there any error in executing PUT request

      • post

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject post(String path,
                                       org.json.simple.JSONObject body)
                                throws AviApiException
        This method calls the POST REST API
        Parameters:
        path - A String containing object type which want to create on the controller.
        body - A JSONObject containing the object body.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject representing the created response of the POST REST call.
        Throws:
        AviApiException - if there any error in executing POST request.

      • delete

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject delete(String path,
                                         String uuid)
                                  throws AviApiException
        This method calls the DELETE REST API.
        Parameters:
        path - A String containing object type which want to delete from the controller.
        uuid - A String containing id of the object which want to DELETE.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject representing response of the DELETE REST call.
        Throws:
        AviApiException - if any error executing DELETE request.
